readme-vars.app_setup_block:
You can find the world maps, mods folder and config files in /config/.minetest.

If you want to override the advertised port, ensure you add --port in your CLI_ARGS AND ensure the internal port reflects the change, ie;
if you set your advertised port to 40000 with --port 40000 then your ports declaration should be 40000:40000/udp


Client and server must be the same version, please browse the tags here to pull the appropriate version for your server:

https://hub.docker.com/r/linuxserver/{{ project_name }}/tags

changelogs.desc: Bugfix to support multiple CLI variables.
Adding custom cli vars to options.
Switching to new Base images, shift to arm32v7 tag.
Rebase to alpine 3.9 to compile 5.0.0 minetest with new build args.
Add pipeline logic and multi arch.
Rebase to alpine 3.8, build from latest release tag instead of master.
Deprecate cpu_core routine lack of scaling.
Use cpu core counting routine to speed up build time.
Rebase to alpine linux, move to main repo.
Change port to UDP, thanks to slashopt for pointing this out.
